TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ResourceProvider extends SkiaSharp.SKObject

Docs.summary: An interface that lets rich-content modules defer loading of external resources (images, fonts, etc.) to embedding clients.

remarks.para: ResourceProvider is used by to load external assets referenced by Lottie animations, such as images, fonts, and nested animations.
Several built-in implementations are available: for loading from the file system, for caching loaded assets, and for loading embedded data URIs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class SkiaSharp.SKData Load(string resourceName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the resource to load.
Docs.summary: Loads a generic resource by name and returns it as data.
Docs.returns: The resource data, or if the resource could not be loaded.
Docs.remarks: This is equivalent to calling with an empty path.

MemberSignature.Value: public SkiaSharp.SKData? Load (string resourcePath, string resourceName);
.method public hidebysig instance class SkiaSharp.SKData Load(string resourcePath, string resourceName) cil managed

Docs.param: The path to the resource directory.
The name of the resource to load.
Docs.summary: Loads a generic resource specified by path and name, and returns it as data.
Docs.returns: The resource data, or if the resource could not be loaded.
Docs.remarks: This method is typically used to load nested animations or other generic data assets.
